Context

Mental Medication is one of my favorite songs from the incredible progressive rock album, U.K. It’s a self-titled album and features incredible virtuosity by Allan Holdsworth, Bill Bruford, John Wetton, and Eddie Jobson. It’s a musical adventure and is so beautiful.

Check out this other really cool video with a transcription of one of the crazier parts of the song:
